thread.title: rod atherton

author: rod atherton
title: rod atherton
text: In the booking there was no mention of the regiments to the final payment as there is [6 people] 3 couples we where each going to pay with our different cards this should be explained in the booking process and now this need to be worked out also one of the cards will be re issued be for we travel, so what do we then do about that. regards Rod Atherton 0402458635
